author: Moanwar
body:
These GNN models are trained to evaluate whether a given trackster should be linked to a track. Two models are provided to cover different track propagation scenarios within the HGCAL:

- First-disk track propagation: FirstDiskPropGNN_v0.onnx

- Interface-disk track propagation: InterfaceDiskPropGNN_v0.onnx

A full inference plugin integrating these models into TICL will be added in a subsequent update.
title: GNN track-tracksters linking
